**The Kirius System development thread**

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/9zZzO)

**Release thread:**

[**http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111439-KopernicusTech-The-Kirius-System-Version-0-6**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111439-KopernicusTech-The-Kirius-System-Version-0-6)

**Requires:**

**KopernicusTech**

**Highly recommended:**

**BetterAtmospheres**

**Custom asteroids**

This pack adds the Kirius system which has 10 celestial bodies and the system is an analog for the Sirius system.

It is about 4 billion km away from Kerbol (pretty far!)

Planned:

- Add more planets/asteroids to orbit Kirius A and B

- Fix more bugs

- Make them actual stars

Developers/contributors:

- SiriusB

- \_Augustus\_

- markothefan1

- Nicholander

Enjoy!

> 
> Isn't Sirius B a Black Hole?

No....

I'm working on improving this mod in both it's gameplay experience and removing as many bugs as possible.

So far I have:

Made Kirius A not be black anymore

Moved Kirius B further from Kirius A

Reduced Kirius A's SOI to only 1000 gigameters so you can still fly ships in the normal Kerbol system

Made a ModuleManager patch that moves a few planets from planet packs to Kirius in addition to making them closer, as Kirius A glitches if further than 50 gigameters
